summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby and Harry Belier discussing positions related to Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It includes a note about an error in a financial item that was discussed with JPM.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in discussing positions related to financial matters.

persons.name: Harry Belier
persons.context: Harry Belier is mentioned in the context of discussing positions and correcting an error related to financial items.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email discusses a financial error related to a position showing (5,000,750) that was to be corrected with JPM.
